dt: {bc}soldiers trained, armed, and equipped to fight on foot
{bc}a branch of an army composed of these soldiers

et: Middle French & Old Italian; Middle French {it}infanterie{/it}, from Old Italian {it}infanteria{/it}, from {it}infante{/it} boy, foot soldier, from Latin {it}infant-, infans{/it}
shortdef: soldiers trained, armed, and equipped to fight on foot
a branch of an army composed of these soldiers
